channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Turning
channel.desc: Kate Mandell takes a job as a nanny for two young orphans at an isolated Gothic mansion in the Maine countryside. She soon learns that the children - Miles and Flora - are emotionally distant and unstable. When strange events start to plague Kate and the siblings, she begins to suspect that the estate's dark corridors are home to a malevolent entity.

channel.name: BBC Parliament UK
channel.title: Northern Ireland Assembly
channel.desc: Coverage of the proceedings in the Northern Ireland Assembly on Tuesday 7 October. (R).

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Stacey & Joe
channel.desc: In this episode at Pickle Cottage, it's all about family. Zach gets time with Dad, Stacey cherishes a visit with Grandma Gwen, and Joe enjoys precious moments with his mum in Spain.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Our Black History Heroes
channel.desc: Mason explains why Jamaican champion sprinter Usain Bolt is his black history hero.
